com.ideopoly.src

Class Chance

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ideopoly.src.Chance

  • public class Chance
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to represent a Chance card.
    Author:
    Daniel Neel

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Chance(int t)
      Create a card of type t, setting its text field.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void doActions(Player p, IdeopolyGUI gui, Player pA, Player pB, Player pC)
      Have the Player p carry out actions associated with a Chance card of this type, using players pA/B/C when necessary.
      java.lang.String getText()
      Get the text field associated with this card.
      int getType()
      Get the type of this card.
